name: Mocha Java Cake
ingredients: 1 cup chocolate chips (or 2 bars of 100 grams each)
1 cup chocolate chips (or 1.5 bars of 100 grams each)
instructions: Melt the margarine, water, sugar and coffee over the heat until it melts well and almost comes to a boil.
Add the chocolate and mix well.
Remove from the heat and add the eggs one by one. (Stir between each egg)
Add the flour, salt and baking powder and mix well.
Pour into a greased medium pan and bake in an oven preheated to 180 degrees for about 20 minutes (until the cake is firm
and the skewer comes out clean). Cool the cake
Prepare the chocolate while you mix the whipped cream with the coffee over the heat (low heat) and only after it melts
Add the chocolate. After this is also well mixed, remove from the heat and stir in the powdered sugar. Cool
the chocolate slightly and pour over the cooled cake
